name: The Lord of the Noses
description:
A very, very, very bad game I made in Scratch, of all of the things.

Also very, very buggy. Converted to HTML using HTMLifier. 

----- ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- -----

Welcome to The Lord of the Noses, a game where you gather a small army to go up levels to visit other lands. 

You need to buy a House and Schnoz IIIs from the Shop. Drag the Schnoz III to position them. Make sure not to go bankrupt!

Then press Play to start the level. You'll get coins by winning, then visit other lands! You can visit the Wild to get Hoppy Hooters, and the Sea to get coins!
